Class GPTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • GPTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class GPTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    A wrapper for the root node of a genetic programming tree.
